subject: Please review the status of invoices in the SAP Business Network
body:
Hello {{supplierName}},

We can see your company is enabled in the SAP Business Network. For invoice status updates, please review the following invoices directly in the SAP Business Network: {{invoiceNumbers}}.

If you still need assistance after reviewing, reply to this email with any additional details.

Best regards,
Accounts Payable

Note: This message was generated with AI assistance.
